getWalkInConsentFormQuestions.message: List of consent form questions fetched successfully.

disclaimerData.disclaimer:
I hereby consent to undergo laser vein removal treatment. I understand that the procedure involves using a laser to eliminate visible veins on my skin. I have been thoroughly informed about the risks and advantages of the procedure and have had all my questions answered to my satisfaction.

I acknowledge that the procedure may lead to the following risks and side effects:

Pain or discomfort during or after the procedure
Temporary redness, swelling, or bruising at the treatment site
Changes in skin color or texture at the treatment site
Scarring
Infection
Blood clots
Adverse reactions to anesthesia (if administered)

I understand that there are no guarantees regarding the results that may be obtained and that additional treatments might be required to achieve the desired outcome.

I also understand that I am responsible for adhering to all pre- and post-procedure instructions provided by my practitioner, including avoiding sun exposure, using topical creams and ointments as directed, and attending all scheduled follow-up appointments.

I confirm that I have been given the opportunity to ask questions and have had all my questions answered to my satisfaction. I am fully informed and comprehend the nature of the procedure, the involved risks, and the anticipated benefits.

questions.content: Do you understand the information that has been provided to you?
Do you feel sufficient information has been shared to enable you to give informed consent?
Has your consent been given freely and voluntarily?
Do you have any medical conditions?
Do you have a neuromuscular disease (e.g., MS, ALS, motor neuropathy, myasthenia gravis, or Lambert-Eaton syndrome)?
Do you have an autoimmune disorder?
Do you have any skin conditions?
Do you have any known allergies or a history of anaphylaxis?
Is there an active infection at the planned treatment site?
Are you taking antibiotics or other prescription drugs?
Is there any other Medical and/or Social History we should be aware of? If yes, please provide complete details here.
What are your objectives and motivations for undergoing this procedure, and what outcome do you desire? Please provide full details here.
Have you had this or a similar treatment previously? If so, did you encounter any issues? Please provide full details here.
Do you have any concerns? If yes, please provide complete details here.
Is there any other information we should know? Please provide full details here.
I will keep this information throughout my treatment course and consult it as needed.
Risks and benefits: Have you been informed of the potential risks and benefits of the procedure?
Sun exposure: Have you been exposed to excessive sun or used a tanning bed in the past month?
